page.title: Nominal Phrase - AdjP Modifiers
page.introduction:
Adjective phrases (AdjP) come next, discussed earlier in
Adjectives and AdjP. This means we will be able to parse nominal phrases such as these in English:

EnglishExample.exItem: just those very few old, dirty books.
all the boyâ€™s many black dogs.
only the first one hundred very eager young boys.

form.introduction: As the English examples show, more than one adjective phrase is allowed before the noun. This will be handled in the syntactic parser by a recursive rule.
